selected_skills.name: count_objects
selected_skills.purpose: To count the number of bars with values less than 6.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to count the bars that meet the condition of having values less than 6.

new_skill_specs.name: read_bar_values_from_chart
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract the values of each bar from a bar chart image.
new_skill_specs.outputs: list of integers representing the values of each bar
edge_cases: Bars with values exactly on the tick marks
Bars with values not aligned with tick marks
